home.subText: AFS's mission is to offer the best-performing foils, boards and wings, while guaranteeing first-rate accessibility and stability. To ensure that all riders can practice their sport in complete safety, whatever the conditions and whatever their riding style (freeride, carving, downwind, surf foil, etc.). These products are designed and manufactured in Brittany, France, by Foil And Co. French manufacturing using the most advanced techniques to offer you the best quality!

checkout.noShippingMethods: No shipping methods available. Please check your shipping address.
checkout.orderNotesPlaceholder: Comments about your order, e.g. delivery instructions.
checkout.terms: I have read and agree to the website terms and conditions
checkout.termsRequired: You must accept the terms and conditions to continue
checkout.emptyCartMessage: Your cart is empty. Please add products before placing an order.
checkout.survey: How did you hear about the brand?

surveyOptions.recommendation: Recommendation from a friend or family member
surveyOptions.direct: Direct link (I typed the site address)

paymentMethods.bacsInstructions: Make your payment directly into our bank account. Please use your Order ID as the payment reference. Your order will not be shipped until the funds have cleared in our account.

checkout.orderConfirmedMessage: Thank you for your order. You will soon receive a confirmation email with your order details.
checkout.emailConfirmationMessage: A summary email has been sent to you with all the details of your order.
checkout.deliveryInfoMessage: You will receive an email with tracking information once your package has been shipped.
checkout.privacyPolicyText: Your personal data will be used to process your order, assist you during your visit to the website, and for other reasons described in our

common.cartClearedLanguage: Your cart has been cleared because you changed the language. Products must be added again in the new language.
common.cartClearedCurrency: Your cart has been cleared because you changed the currency. Products must be added again.
